channel.title: Internet Fraud Case: Jagex LTD!~Any Mod Delete Plz~!
channel.description: Jagex replaced my money and account in exchange for me buying a years membership... oh well me and my beloved account are back on RS

darkest_mage:

Jagex replaced my money and account in exchange for me buying a years membership… oh well me and my beloved account are back on RS

item.title: Internet Fraud Case: Jagex LTD!~Any Mod Delete Plz~!
item.dc:creator: @darkest_mage darkest_mage
item.description:
@darkest_mage wrote:

the whole point of it isnt to gain any money… its to show jagex that they need to quit being a bunch of scammers it is to show them that many people are unsatisfied with their game there has to be like 300 messages on here a loss that big to them would be a disaster[br][size=1]Posted at: 26 May 2006, 04:16:47[/size][hr]doesnt matter anyway… runescape is really making me mad now their saying i owe compensation for the banks “Refusal” to process the request they shouldnt have allowed the account to be a member until they got the money[br][size=1]Posted at: 26 May 2006, 04:26:02[/size][hr]Jagex replaced my money and account in exchange for me buying a years membership… oh well me and my beloved account are back on RS

@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:51, topic:3256”][quote author=ipl0x link=topic=3787.msg37747#msg37747 date=1148616293]

It’s the way the person reads the post, to me it sounded like you were basing it as if I am a legit player, my bad.

Sorry if I sounded like an ass, I wasn’t trying to sound like one. It’s hard to show expression in text sometimes…

NP bro.
Aren’t you the same jme off of autorune? I’m was ipl0x on there aswell.
[/quote]

I dont recall your name(sorry ) but yes I was jme…[/quote]

Cool, I wasn’t that active as I am here, just hangin around there for the outcome of their supposed AR2 bot.

item.title: Internet Fraud Case: Jagex LTD!~Any Mod Delete Plz~!
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:47, topic:3256”][quote author=ipl0x link=topic=3787.msg37736#msg37736 date=1148615687]

ipl0x, you should respect your father who lead to the creation of you, so he could have sex with your toight an0r.

This game does suck. That’s why we mess with it

Ok, I’d like to see you make a multi player game that will be better then Runescape, noob.

1.) I agree with PWND.
2.) Even though you said it to pwnd, I’m working on that, just give me some time Points to sig
3.) Runescape is pretty lousy, Pwnd never said he could do better. Go play some other games or hang around some gamedev forums and you’ll especially hate runescape(And Tibia).

And who told you I play runescape? I only auto for money, no legit shit.
[/quote]

I never said that you play runescape :S[/quote]

It’s the way the person reads the post, to me it sounded like you were basing it as if I am a legit player, my bad.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @theghost14 theghost14
item.description:
@theghost14 wrote:

Ok i just popped back on the forum and guess what i got a great answer for this…

Same thing happened to me.Did i care no,it was a lowesly 5 bucks that when jagex got like 500 payments a day then might have skipped me and said no payment BANNED.Who the hell cares for a lowesly 5 bucks.Wow that whole 5 bucks made them 5 dam dollers richer.The max you could get out of this court is about 10 to 15 dollers if ur lucky and win.Jagex will send there gay fuck lawers and andrew wont come because kiddies who play runescape will go “OMG ADD POHS OMGZ PLZ!!!PH33 ST0x PLOX TO MY ACCOUNT KZ?”

Theres my answer its kinda flameing but it answers most of what ur going to get

@jme wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:33, topic:3256”][quote author=weaselforce link=topic=3787.msg37090#msg37090 date=1148507573]
they have pretty good lawyers… and plenty of money to back it up
[/quote]
He also has a good case.[/quote]

It’s unfortunate, but the way it seems to be run in todays world is whoever spends more money on a lawyer, or whoever HAS more money is more likely to win.

South Park demonstarted this pretty good(although highly exaggerated) with the Lawyer that would cost a million dollars, and would somehow win just by talking about Chubaca(sp?).

item.title: Internet Fraud Case: Jagex LTD!~Any Mod Delete Plz~!
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

darkest_mage:

hey… i am currently building a law suit for Internet fraud and guess who im going to be suing… none other than our very much hated Jagex LTD… for internet fraud… they banned me after billing my account… why did they bann me you ask… because the payment supposedly did not reach their office HQ… well let me tell you something my friends i know it did because i have my bank statement… i sent the money Direct Debit… the bank has proof and i have proof and if anyone else has proof they have been banned like this i would like you to contact your local Internet Fraud report center… (Local Police) and we will all press charges on Jagex LTD

wtf, just die.

Read full topic
